Dr. Gandhi, 
This letter is to _____(141) your appointment for next week. 
Also, the Bascom Institute sent an email regarding the conference that you 're holding next month. They showed much _____(142) in it and mentioned that they hope to be considered for the priority partnership hospital list. 
Due to your _____(143) schedule this week, the hospital decided to give you a week of vacation after the conference. 
I will have all the material ready for the conference by the end of this week. See you tommorow! 
Sincerely, 
Raphael Maze

Come join in us as our guests and discover why we are so excited about North Lucas. 
When you experience the world famous North Lucas area, you will soon feel the warmth and friendliness of its people and see the beauty the area has to offer. Many choose to live and retire here because of the great positives that North Lucas life offers. Interested in coming down for an exploratory holiday to see our real estate investment opportunities? 
Register 15 people for a trip and your trip will be paid for by us. 
Register 30 people for a trip and your trip will be paid for by us along with a $100 bonus! 
We supply all the necessary guidebooks to group members and handle all bookings and paperwork. 
To learn more, call our office at 1-790-4559-0990 or visit our website at www.northlucas.com. 
North Lucas Associates 
#214 Alvaro Obregon St. 
La Paz, B. C. S. Mexico 
CP 23000 
www.northlucas.com 
Sam Dolnick 
4321 First Street 
Sydney, NSW 2109 
October 5th 
Dear Mr. Donick, 
Congratulations on being selected as a recipient of a free trip to North Lucas and thank you for choose North Lucas as your investment partner. 
North Lucas Associates brings experience, knowledge and professionalism to all of our customers whether it is for residential, commercial or complete property development needs. We pride ourselves on our customer service and being there for our clients through the entire process both before and after the purchase. 
We 
guarantee
 that your group of 16 people will have a wonderful time in North Lucas from December 15 to 18.Feel free to add more people to your group at any time up four weeks before the trip. 
We will mail some more detail information about the trip later this week. In the meantime, feel free to join the travelers' forum on our website to receive valuable travel and investment tips. 
Best wishes, 
Theo-Gardener

items.context:
To:
 Nelson@jugan.net
From:
Kevin@gnp.com
Date:
 April 1 
Dear Mr. Nelson, 
We are sorry you did not receive your package as promptly as you expected. We experienced an unusually large number of orders last week, which disrupted our normal delivery schedule. While your order is being prepared for dispatch, to serve you better and faster, we need further information about your preferred method of delivery. one item is currently out of stock(marked "DD" on the shipment status log ) and is not due for delivery to our ware house until the next week. The items marked "AO" (in stock) will be shipped immediately by express mail along with "PO" and "RO" ("preferred order" and "regular order") items. Do you want your orders delivered in two separate shipments, or should be sent together when all the items become available? 
We hope this has not cause you too much inconvenience. To compensate for the delayed delivery, we are sending you a coupon for $5 off your next order from our catalog. Again, we apologize for any inconvenience we might have caused and look forward to filling your future orders in a timely manner. 
Sincerely, 
Kelvin Powell 
Customer Service Department 
GNP Cosmetics
Online Store 
Order Tracking Log
Customer:
 Nelson
Customer ID:
 NS0934
Order placed:
 March 23
Order No:
 098345

items.context:
Dear Mr. Jackson, 
We just wanted to let you know that your vehicle has been repaired. According to the documents that you filled out, it shows that a certain portion of your payment was supposed to be paid by the insurance company. However, that payment request has been declined by your insurance company.
The entire repair process cost $2,100, none of which has been covered by your insurance company. We strongly recommended you contact your insurance agent and resolve this problem as soon as possible in order to avoid any extra charges to your account. 
Thank you. 
Sincerely, 
Tom Truman. 
To:
 Edmund Insurance Company 
Hello, my name is Peter Jackson, a customer protected by the Personal Vehicle Protection Service. Two weeks ago, I had an accident, which i reported to your company through my insurance agent. When I spoke to the agent, she told me that 80% of the total cost would be covered by my insurance plan. However, I received a letter from the repair shop saying that the payment request has been declined by your insurance company. 
Please contact me as soon as possible regarding this matter. 
Thank you, 
Sincerely, 
Peter Jackson

questions.content: What is the relationship between the two letters?
What is the purpose of the first letter?
options: A. To charge the customer an unpaid amount of money
B. To sue the insurance company for the unfair decline of the request
C. To complain that the payment request has been declined
D. To alert a customer that the payment request was declined by the insurance company

questions.content: What can be inferred about Peter Jackson?
options: A. He doesn't care whether the insurance company pays for the damages or not.
B. He never contacted his agent regarding the accident
C. He is responsible for a certain amount
D. He is not sure if the company will pay for the damages or not

questions.content: What is NOT mentioned in both the letters?
options: B. The time of the accident

questions.content: How much will Peter probably have to pay if the request is accepted?

items.context:
To: 
guitarld@hotmail.com
From:
 jjhutchinson@gmail.com
Date: 
May 2nd
Title:
 Concert Date Confirmation 
Hey Chris, 
I hope preparations for the concert are going well! I was told by the concert hall manager that a hall will be available on the 4th, 8th and 21st of the next month. I didn't give him a final answer because I wasn't sure how much time you need to rehearse. 
As you know, this will be one of the most important concerts for your band, as it's the first one since the release of your last album two years ago. Since you've decided to perform more concerts than make another album, this first concert should really be something special. 
Personally, I thought that the 8th would be the best as long as it gives you enough time to rehearse. I think the 4th would be a little too early. The 21st would be okay, but I'm just not sure because Marine Force is putting on the concert on the 23rd. Thus, I think that would take away some people who would go to your concert. 
Get back to me as soon as possible so I can finalize the schedule with the concert hall staff. Thanks. 
Dave 
The hottest news in the music industry lately is the Han's first concert in two years. Two years ago, Han's, one of the most popular rock bands, expressed its intention to focus on concerts instead of recording any new albums. After two years, fans are finally able to see them again. However, critics are expressing a few concerns about the band. 
Firstly, Why hasn't a band performed for the past two years? Two years seem like a long time for their fans. 
Secondly, while Han's has been off radar, other new bands such as Marine Force have quickly risen to the top of the charts. More importantly, Han's and Marine Force will be performing only two days apart. This will cause an 
inevitable
 competition between the two top bands. 
As much as fans have been waiting for Han's concert, it better satisfy fans' expectations in order to keep them away from Marine Force.

options: B. Competition between Han's and Marine Force
C. Confirmation of a concert date

options: A. It is a new band.
B. It has not yet announced its concert dates.
C. It has not lost any of its fans over the last two years.
D. some are concerned about the band's popularity after the last two years

options: A. The band cannot secure enough time for rehearsal.
B. There is another concert on the same day.
C. Another band will perform a few days later.
D. The venue is not available

questions.content: What is true about the passages?
options: A. Han's has just released their latest album.
B. Han's was formed two years ago
C. Han's will hold a concert on June 21st
D. The concert will last two days

items.context:
March 13 
Matt Greenhouse 
4343 W Northwest Highway # 300, Dallas TX 
Dear Mr. Greenhouse, 
My name is Ben Moran, one of the owners of East Oaks Hotel. I am writing to inquire about your services. I received your contact information from Christie Palmer of Palmer Catering Service. She said your company has 40 years of experience in this field, and that you've maintained a longstanding reputation for high-quality service which has helped a lot of local businesses grow. 
East Oaks Hotel is located in Houston's Galeria neighborhood, close to Galleria Mall, Memorial Park, and Williams Tower. Nearby points of interest also include the Houston Arboretum and Nature Center and River Oaks Country Club. We opened four months ago and would like to find a way to increase our visibility in the local market. Though our room rates are relatively high, we provide top-quality service and offer an exclusive view over the Caines River. 
East Oaks Hotel also has three restaurants and recreational amenities that include an outdoor pool. We have a 24-hour business center and offer small meeting rooms, technology support staff, and audio-visual equipment. East Oaks Hotel has 93, 000 square feet of event space, consisting of banquet facilities, conference/ meeting rooms, a ballroom, and exhibit space. We also offer a round trip airport shuttle at scheduled times. Business services, wedding services, and tour/ticket assistance are available as well. 
I am interested in how you would 
address
 the concerns I have explained above. I would also like to schedule a meeting to discuss this in more detail. I will call you soon to follow up. 
Sincerely, 
Ben Moran

options: A. He partnered with the company in the past.
B. He received a recommendation from someone else
C. He saw a newspaper interview with Mr. Greenhouse.

items.context:
GNet Inc. 
3124 Kipt Avenue, New Kensington PA 
To whom it may concern,
I am writing about the DMP5 I purchased on September 14 at your retail outlet in Forest Hills. It featured an electronic dictionary and an MP3 player. I spoke to the salesperson, whose name is a Michael Robertson, at length about my needs and told him that I was interested in durability rather than functions. He said he carried the DMP4 for $500 and the DMP5 for $600. I knew that DMP4 was renowned for its durability. Mr. Robinson assured me that the DMP5 had recently come out with more functions and would hold up as well, if not better than the DMP4. 
On Mr. Robertson's recommendation, I purchased the DMP5 and, upon receipt, he informed me that should I have a problem with it, I could exchange it for a new model as long as it was in the original packaging. Since GNet Inc. is not based locally, it would take too long to transport it to and from the maintenance department at your headquarters for processing. To save time, the retailer where I purchased the item said he would exchange it for a new one and send it back himself. 
However, after one of use, I found the protective cover has been ineffective in protecting it from other objects in my bag, which caused the initial programming and operating problems. When explaining this to Mr. Robertson, he stated that I am not entitled to an exchange and should contact the company directly. Since the DMP5 was purchased on your retailer's recommendation, I would like to ask for an exchange. 
I'd greatly appreciate it if this issue could be rectified immediately. 
Sincerely, 
Kim Severson

questions.content: Why was this letter sent?
Why did Mr. Severson purchase the DMP5?
options: A. A retailer advised him to buy it.
D. The item was on sale.

questions.content: Why was Mr. Severson NOT allowed to exchange the item?
options: A. The problem he had was not included in the warranty agreement.
D. The item was not in its original packaging.

questions.content: Who is Michael Robertson?
options: A. The owner of GNet Inc.
B. An employee at a DMP manufacturer
D. A friend of Kim Severson's.

To:
 Michael Luo
From: 
Kareem Fahim
Date: 
April 1 
Dear Mr. Luo, 
This is to inform you that we have discussed your proposal at the board meeting last week and have carefully reviewed your estimate on the new project. As you might have heard, the CEO and COO found your proposal very satisfactory and highly feasible. However, we are unable to sign this contract immediately, as final approval of expenditures of this nature must come from the accounting department. We expect to receive approval or disapproval within the week. 
Accordingly, we have to move the project briefing scheduled for tomorrow to next Monday and ask you to give a presentation next Monday at 1:30 p.m. I know this is a last-minute change, but I hope that this will not be too much of an inconvenience for you. If the new schedule is a problem, please let me know as soon as possible. 
And if we may be of any assistance in the meantime, please feel free to contact this office. 
Sincerely, 
Kareem Fahim.

items.context:
Oil spills at sea threaten animal life, plant life and other marine resources. Oil can also cause long-term environmental and economic damage to marine ecosystems near a spill. There are several ways to tackle oil spills at sea. The best method is to collect the oil and physically recover it from the water. However, the mechanical recovery of oil is not feasible in rough weather conditions. Secondly, the cost of oil cleanups by mechanical means is high when compared to chemical cleanup methods. 
Today, the chemical dispersion of oil is one of the most favored ways to deal with offshore oil pollution. These chemicals contain surface active agents in a solvent base which are absorbed at the oil/water interface and lower interfacial tension. This facilitates the production of small oil droplets into the water column. Oil dispersed effectively into a larger volume of seawater is rapidly diluted by turbulence and its concentration is reduced soon to background levels. 
Concern that chemical dispersants could be toxic to marine life has led to considerable caution in authorizing their use at spill sites. The newest generation of dispersants is less acutely toxic than earlier products, though misuse can lead to environmental hazards. Secondly, our dispersants satisfy the efficiency, stability and toxicity criteria and have received approval from the government. To request a test sample, please send email us at manager@dispersant.com.

questions.content: What is this advertisement mainly about?
When is this product used?
options: A. When sea animals are infected
C. When oil is spilled onboard a ship
D. When the sea is polluted with a certain fuel

questions.content: Which is NOT one of the characteristics of the product?
options: A. It collects the oil and physically recovers it from the water.
B. It is effective even in rough weather conditions.
C. It costs less than conventional cleanup methods.
D. It is not hazardous as long as used properly.

questions.content: What happens after the dispersant produces small oil droplets?
options: A. The chemicals are absorbed at the oil/ water interface.
B. Oil is diluted into a lower concentration level.
C. The chemicals collect small oil droplets
D. The small oil droplets move to towards the seashore.

items.context:
To: 
Jane Hale
From:
 Louise Story
Subject:
 Daily Childcare
Date: 
June 14 
Dear Jane, 
In order for the Daily Childcare Center to effectively determine the needs of the center, we are conducting a follow-up survey of all parents of enrolled children. Your response to this survey is crucial in providing the necessary information to formulate useful programs and activities in upcoming years. 
The purpose of this survey is to determine to what extent the programs and activities we operated this year have affected your children's overall development. Your honest assessment will provide beneficial information to our center. As a token for our appreciation, we are sending you a first aid kit that will be shipped to you as soon as your completed survey arrives. 
Enclosed you will find a self-addressed stamped envelope to use when returning the survey. Please feel free to include any additional comments you deem necessary or relevant to improving our center. Your response is greatly appreciated. If you prefer not to be contacted about participating in surveys in the future, please send me an e-mail or call me. 
Thank you! 
Sincerely, 
Louise Story 
Manager, Daily Childcare Center

items.context:
To:
 All directors
From: 
Reed Abelson
Date: 
September 19
Subject:
 Directors' meeting agenda 
Dear Directors, 
In response to changing publication trends, I offer the following agenda to discuss at the directors' meeting next Monday. 
Our sales department reports that sale of the Fishing Monthly in print edition have been drastically declining over the past couple of years and have actually dropped by 40% this year. Since print publication rates are diminishing and electronic publication rates and rising, we also have to consider turning our sights on electronic publication. 
There is statistical evidence that electronic publishing provides wider dissemination, and a number of journals have already established electronic versions or even moved entirely to electronic publication. Electronic publication will cut down production and shipping costs and attract more readers at a reduced price and with better accessibility. In addition, the government offers subsidies for green publishing to companies which adopt a publishing process to minimize the impact on the environment by using digital or print- on- demand technology. 
Given these facts, I'd like us to start thinking about ways to promote Fishing Monthly's online edition and reduce the print edition by at least 50% next year. In order to cut down on print publishing, we might have to shut down some of our production plants. This surely is not an easy decision. However, given the current bus business climate, I feel these changes are absolutely essential to succeed in the coming year and beyond. 
I look forward to discussing this and other issues involving the magazine with all of you on Monday. 
Reed.

questions.content: Why was this e-mail written?
options: A. To oppose a decision made at a meeting
B. To propose a way to promote the magazine
C. To change a subject for discussion
D. To advocate a reduction in the sale of the magazine

questions.content: What does Mr. Abelson suggest?
options: B. Discussing the closing of every production facility
C. Making the magazine available online
D. Promoting sales by increasing online advertisements

Edward Wang has made his designs known in the fashion world. And TIMS, a women's bag company founded by Wang 5 years ago, has gained greater name recognition recently. Whether it be through word of mouth, celebrity sighting, or time on TV, TIMS has cultivated a strong following. The Chinese-born Edward Wang is making waves not only in Asia but also in the USA bag market. 
TIMS bags are known for their exotic materials and standout designs. His cocktail Tote is especially popular, offering a square tote shape with unique alternating patterns. His pouch clutches are many peoples' favorite as well, as they are easy to carry and can be use informally and formally. Not only did i take exclusive shots of bags, but also i have special discount code for all our readers! Our readers will receive 10% off the market when the price enter code CFHSBG at checkout on the website. The code will be kept up from today until Sunday. An amazing 10% off TIMS bags means this is the perfect place to shop for exotic bags for the holidays.
